system.description: Frees victims from enchantments, transmutations, and curses. Can reverse even an instantaneous effect. For each effect, make a caster level check (1d20 + caster level, max +15) against DC 11 + caster level of the effect. For a cursed magic item, DC is 25. Only works on spells 5th level or lower if they cannot be dispelled by dispel magic.
system.target: Up to one creature per level, all within 30 ft. of each other
